scripts.dist:node: microbundle build --raw --no-compress --target node --format modern,cjs src/index.ts --output dist/ndarray-pixels-node.js
scripts.dist:browser: microbundle build --raw --no-compress --target web --format modern,cjs src/index.ts --output dist/ndarray-pixels-browser.js --alias ./node-get-pixels=./browser-get-pixels.ts,./node-save-pixels=./browser-save-pixels.ts
scripts.docs: typedoc src/index.ts --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ./docs --hideBreadcrumbs --hidePageHeader && cat docs/functions/*.md | sed "s/# /### /g" | replace-between --target README.md --token API && rm -rf docs
scripts.release: yarn postversion:commit && yarn npm publish && yarn postversion:push
scripts.prerelease: yarn postversion:commit && yarn npm publish --tag alpha && yarn postversion:push
scripts.postversion:commit: git add -u && git commit -m "chore(release): v$npm_package_version" && git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m v$npm_package_version
scripts.postversion:push: git push && git push --tags && yarn coverage:report
scripts.prepublish: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn validate
scripts.prepack: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn docs
